name: Taranis Game Engine
short_description:
Taranis is planned to become a crossplatform universal Game Engine written in C++ in combination with Qt.
Intended parts are: Math/Physics, Network, Input, Audio, Graphics including  support for DirectX9/10 as well as for OpenGL.
